Otis Mountain Get Down at Otis Mountain

with Kassa Overall, GIFT, Salin, Johnny Franco & his real brother Dom, Four D, Nabihah Iqbal, La Banda Chuska, Ponyhustle, John Moods, Maya Ongaku

  • Nov 12, 2024
  • Elizabethtown, New York

Our first family camping festival. We made it out alive. But I didn’t see as much music as I wanted. Those darn kids.
